source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Tag,
       Period_type,
       TYPE,
       Period_Date,
       Brand,
       GFO,
       "Need State",
       Category,
       "Sub-Category",
       Segment,
       "Sub-Segment",
       Manufacturer,
       "Country/Cluster",
       Region,
       "Market Type",
       Cluster,
       "Country (geo)",
       "Special Region",
       "Country Strategic Role",
       Universe,
       "Last Period",
        Value,
       brand_manufacturer_flg,
       "Database Category",
       "Database Date",
       "Text Desc",
       Metric_Period,
       "Update",
       FileName,
       Channel
FROM bpanorama.bpwarehouse.GBA_QSD_Market
where region='APAC';

select 
	ID 
	,Division 
	,Segment 
	,CustomerCode 
	,REPLACE(REPLACE(replace(CustomerName,',',' '), CHAR(13), ''), CHAR(10), '')as CustomerName
	,CustomerNameLocal 
	,CustomerType 
	,CustomerTelephone
	,CustomerAddress 
	,CityCode 
	,ChannelCode 
	,SubChannelCode 
	,AccountGroupCode 
	,DeptCode 
	,SalesArea
	,VendorCode  
	,DirectSupplier 
	,AcctAtCust  
	,BlockCompany
	,BlockOrder
	,HeadquarterSoldToCode 
	,replace(DistributorCode,',',' ') as DistributorCode
	,IsHighRisk
	,Status 
	,Comment 
	,ORG
	,CustomerHead 
	,AccountGroupHeader 
	,TaxNumber 
	,Buslic 
	,MobilePhone 
	,IsFollow 
	,FollowDate 
	,SpOpenID 
	,PNOpenID 
	,Contact 
	,Post 
	,IsNew 
	,FinanceYear
	,SalesOrgCode
	,SalesOrgName
	,ApplicationID 
	,Version 
	,LastModifyUserID 
	,LastModifyTime 
	,CityName 
	,CityCluster 
	,CityClusterName 
	,ProvinceCode 
	,ProvinceName 
	,NewTime 
	,DataSource 
	,PayerCode 
	,PayerName 
	,HQCityCode 
	,IndirectStoreTye 
	,AccountGroupType 
	,RTMChannelCode 
	,VATCode
from JNJ_TPM.[dbo].[MD_Customer];
